roleset.name: mess up, ruin, make a mistake
roleset.note: MUCK_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muck up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from muck.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: causer of the bad situation, person mucking things up

example.name: the one and only
example.text: But Brooks declined, figuring that transporting the mucked up money to Washington would cost the company thousands more.

roleset.name: clean out
roleset.note: MUCK_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muck up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from muck.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: Mining
example.text: I've been mucking in a mine in the San Juan, but I used to work on a ranch.
